name: ice-ball
caption: Ice Ball

effect.short: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.
effect.full:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  User is forced to use this move for five turns.  Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends.  If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends.

If the user has used []{move:defense-curl} since entering the field, this move has double power.

flavorText:
